ai_metadata.title: AI Metadata
ai_metadata.description:
**Template Version:** 1.0
**AI Processing Level:** High
**Required Context:** Feature plan, project architecture, existing patterns
**Validation Required:** Yes
**Code Generation:** Supported

**Dependencies:**
- `feature_template.json` - Feature plan reference
- `../project_context/architecture_overview.json` - System architecture
- `../project_context/common_patterns.json` - Project patterns

**Validation Rules:**
- All code examples must be syntactically correct
- File paths must reference actual codebase structure
- Implementation steps must be sequential and complete
- Code examples must follow existing patterns
- All imports and dependencies must be specified
